abstract: The company’s quarter was led by sales of Macintosh computers and a burst in iPhone purchases, after the introduction of the new 3GS.
snippet: The company’s quarter was led by sales of Macintosh computers and a burst in iPhone purchases, after the introduction of the new 3GS.
lead_paragraph: SAN FRANCISCO  While earnings have faltered at other electronics companies, unexpectedly strong sales of Macintosh computers and a surge in iPhone purchases pushed Apple’s profit up 15 percent in the third quarter, the company said Tuesday.

headline.main: Sales Drive Robust Quarter for Apple
headline.print_headline: Apple Reports Robust Profit As Macs Shine
